training noun [U]
(SUPPLYING DATA)
in machine learning (= the study of creating computer systems that can improve their own ability to carry out tasks by analysing new data), the process of creating or improving a computer representation of a system or process by supplying it with data: training data The study investigates the impact of biased training data on generative AI performance. The models performed well when tested on new categories not seen during training.
